mapper.sql: select ID,FID,FBillNo, FStatus,FShenqingren,FSqrID, FYuanShenqingren,FYuanSqrID,FYewuxingming, FYewubumen,Fsqriqi,Fkehumingcheng, Fkehudaima,Fyewudaima,Flaifangriqi, Fdijicisongyang,Fxiangmuxinxi,Fshangcishenqingdanhao, Fkegongyanju,Fkouweishuliang,Fyangpinxuqiuriqi, Fyanjuleixing,Fpipeishichang,Ftiandu, Fliangdu,Fnianchoudu,Fkouweizhuangong, Fxianchangshiyou,Fyoujixinxi,Fzidaiyanju, Fhuishouyanju,Ffaresizhonglei,Ffaresizuzhi, Fyanyoucangrongliang,Fdaoyoumianzhonglei,Fnigudinghanliang, Fyoubeicaizhi,Fqiwangwanchengshijian,Fyangpinxuqiushuliang, Fyujiwanchengshijian,FVG,Fbeizhu, Ffenpeigenjinren,FCurSpBillNo,FTijiaoTime, FShenheTime,FFenpeiTime,FLastModifyBy, FLastModifyTime from T_SAL_Txsqd
mapper.select: select a.FID,a.FBillNo,a.FStatus,a.FShenqingren,a.FSqrID,a.FYuanShenqingren,a.FYuanSqrID,a.FYewuxingming,a.FYewubumen,a.Fsqriqi,a.Fkehumingcheng,a.Fkehudaima,a.Fyewudaima,a.Flaifangriqi,a.Fdijicisongyang,a.Fxiangmuxinxi,a.Fshangcishenqingdanhao,a.Fkegongyanju,a.Fkouweishuliang,a.Fyangpinxuqiuriqi,a.Fyanjuleixing,a.Fpipeishichang,a.Ftiandu,a.Fliangdu,a.Fnianchoudu,a.Fkouweizhuangong,a.Fxianchangshiyou,a.Fyoujixinxi,a.Fzidaiyanju,a.Fhuishouyanju,a.Ffaresizhonglei,a.Ffaresizuzhi,a.Fyanyoucangrongliang,a.Fdaoyoumianzhonglei,a.Fnigudinghanliang,a.Fyoubeicaizhi,a.Fqiwangwanchengshijian,a.Fyangpinxuqiushuliang,a.Fyujiwanchengshijian,a.FVG,a.Fbeizhu,a.Ffenpeigenjinren,a.FCurSpBillNo,a.FTijiaoTime,a.FShenheTime,a.FFenpeiTime,a.FLastModifyBy,a.FLastModifyTime, b.FID as sub_FID ,b.FSeq as sub_FSeq ,b.FParentId as sub_FParentId, b.Fkouweimingcheng as sub_Fkouweimingcheng ,b.Fkouweimiaoshu as sub_Fkouweimiaoshu , b.Fjichukouwei as sub_Fjichukouwei ,b.Fjichukouweimingcheng as sub_Fjichukouweimingcheng , b.Fjichukouweigaishanyijian as sub_Fjichukouweigaishanyijian ,b.Frongliang as sub_Frongliang , b.Fvg as sub_Fvg ,b.Fniclb as sub_Fniclb ,b.Fnicnd as sub_Fnicnd ,b.Fnicdw as sub_Fnicdw ,b.Ftiaoxiangshi as sub_Ftiaoxiangshi ,b.Fbanben as sub_Fbanben , b.Fxuanzepeifangbanben as sub_Fxuanzepeifangbanben ,b.FxuanzepeifangbanbenID as sub_FxuanzepeifangbanbenID ,b.Ffentiaoxiangshi as sub_Ffentiaoxiangshi , b.FfentiaoxiangshiID as sub_FfentiaoxiangshiID ,b.FKwZhuangtai as sub_FKwZhuangtai , b.FXgZhuangtai as sub_FXgZhuangtai ,b.FJdZhuangtai as sub_FJdZhuangtai ,b.Fyujiwanchengshijian as sub_Fyujiwanchengshijian ,b.FIsDeleted as sub_FIsDeleted , b.FfenpeitiaoxiangshiTime as sub_FfenpeitiaoxiangshiTime ,b.LastModifyBy as sub_LastModifyBy from T_SAL_Txsqd a left join T_SAL_Txsqdmx b on b.FParentId = a.FID

select a.FID,a.FBillNo,a.FStatus,a.FShenqingren,a.FSqrID,a.FYuanShenqingren,a.FYuanSqrID,a.FYewuxingming,a.FYewubumen,a.Fsqriqi,a.Fkehumingcheng,a.Fkehudaima,a.Fyewudaima,a.Flaifangriqi,a.Fdijicisongyang,a.Fxiangmuxinxi,a.Fshangcishenqingdanhao,a.Fkegongyanju,a.Fkouweishuliang,a.Fyangpinxuqiuriqi,a.Fyanjuleixing,a.Fpipeishichang,a.Ftiandu,a.Fliangdu,a.Fnianchoudu,a.Fkouweizhuangong,a.Fxianchangshiyou,a.Fyoujixinxi,a.Fzidaiyanju,a.Fhuishouyanju,a.Ffaresizhonglei,a.Ffaresizuzhi,a.Fyanyoucangrongliang,a.Fdaoyoumianzhonglei,a.Fnigudinghanliang,a.Fyoubeicaizhi,a.Fqiwangwanchengshijian,a.Fyangpinxuqiushuliang,a.Fyujiwanchengshijian,a.FVG,a.Fbeizhu,a.Ffenpeigenjinren,a.FCurSpBillNo,a.FTijiaoTime,a.FShenheTime,a.FFenpeiTime,a.FLastModifyBy,a.FLastModifyTime, b.FID as sub_FID,b.FSeq as sub_FSeq,b.FParentId as sub_FParentId, b.Fkouweimingcheng as sub_Fkouweimingcheng,b.Fkouweimiaoshu as sub_Fkouweimiaoshu, b.Fjichukouwei as sub_Fjichukouwei,b.Fjichukouweimingcheng as sub_Fjichukouweimingcheng, b.Fjichukouweigaishanyijian as sub_Fjichukouweigaishanyijian,b.Frongliang as sub_Frongliang, b.Fvg as sub_Fvg,b.Fniclb as sub_Fniclb,b.Fnicnd as sub_Fnicnd,b.Fnicdw as sub_Fnicdw,b.Ftiaoxiangshi as sub_Ftiaoxiangshi,b.Fbanben as sub_Fbanben, b.Fxuanzepeifangbanben as sub_Fxuanzepeifangbanben,b.FxuanzepeifangbanbenID as sub_FxuanzepeifangbanbenID,b.Ffentiaoxiangshi as sub_Ffentiaoxiangshi, b.FfentiaoxiangshiID as sub_FfentiaoxiangshiID,b.FKwZhuangtai as sub_FKwZhuangtai, b.FXgZhuangtai as sub_FXgZhuangtai,b.FJdZhuangtai as sub_FJdZhuangtai,b.Fyujiwanchengshijian as sub_Fyujiwanchengshijian,b.FIsDeleted as sub_FIsDeleted, b.FfenpeitiaoxiangshiTime as sub_FfenpeitiaoxiangshiTime,b.LastModifyBy as sub_LastModifyBy from T_SAL_Txsqd a left join T_SAL_Txsqdmx b on b.FParentId = a.FID where a.FID = #{fid}
mapper.insert:
insert into T_SAL_Txsqd
ID, FID, FBillNo, FStatus, FShenqingren, FSqrID, FYuanShenqingren, FYuanSqrID, FYewuxingming, FYewubumen, Fsqriqi, Fkehumingcheng, Fkehudaima, Fyewudaima, Flaifangriqi, Fdijicisongyang, Fxiangmuxinxi, Fshangcishenqingdanhao, Fkegongyanju, Fkouweishuliang, Fyangpinxuqiuriqi, Fyanjuleixing, Fpipeishichang, Ftiandu, Fliangdu, Fnianchoudu, Fkouweizhuangong, Fxianchangshiyou, Fyoujixinxi, Fzidaiyanju, Fhuishouyanju, Ffaresizhonglei, Ffaresizuzhi, Fyanyoucangrongliang, Fdaoyoumianzhonglei, Fnigudinghanliang, Fyoubeicaizhi, Fqiwangwanchengshijian, Fyangpinxuqiushuliang, Fyujiwanchengshijian, FVG, Fbeizhu, Ffenpeigenjinren, FCurSpBillNo, FTijiaoTime, FShenheTime, FFenpeiTime, FLastModifyBy, FLastModifyTime,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fbillno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fshenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsqrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyuanshenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyuansqrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyewuxingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyewubumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsqriqi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fkehumingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkehudaima,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyewudaima,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flaifangriqi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fdijicisongyang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxiangmuxinxi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fshangcishenqingdanhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkegongyanju,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkouweishuliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyangpinxuqiuriqi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fyanjuleixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpipeishichang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftiandu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fliangdu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fnianchoudu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkouweizhuangong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxianchangshiyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyoujixinxi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fzidaiyanju,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fhuishouyanju,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffaresizhonglei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffaresizuzhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyanyoucangrongliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdaoyoumianzhonglei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fnigudinghanliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyoubeicaizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fqiwangwanchengshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fyangpinxuqiushuliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyujiwanchengshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fvg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbeizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffenpeigenjinren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcurspbillno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftijiaotime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fshenhetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ffenpeitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flastmodifyby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flastmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update T_SAL_Txsqd

FSqrID = #{fsqrid},

where Fid = #{fid}

mapper.insert:
insert into T_SAL_Txsqdmx( FSeq,FParentId, Fkouweimingcheng,Fkouweimiaoshu,Fjichukouwei, Fjichukouweimingcheng,Fjichukouweigaishanyijian,Frongliang, Fvg,Fniclb,Fnicnd, Fnicdw,Ftiaoxiangshi,Fbanben, Fxuanzepeifangbanben,FxuanzepeifangbanbenID,Ffentiaoxiangshi, FfentiaoxiangshiID,FKwZhuangtai,FXgZhuangtai, FJdZhuangtai,Fyujiwanchengshijian,FIsDeleted, FfenpeitiaoxiangshiTime,LastModifyBy) values
( #{item.FSeq}, #{item.FParentId}, #{item.Fkouweimingcheng}, #{item.Fkouweimiaoshu}, #{item.Fjichukouwei}, #{item.Fjichukouweimingcheng}, #{item.Fjichukouweigaishanyijian}, #{item.Frongliang}, #{item.Fvg}, #{item.Fniclb}, #{item.Fnicnd}, #{item.Fnicdw}, #{item.Ftiaoxiangshi}, #{item.Fbanben},#{item.Fxuanzepeifangbanben},#{item.FxuanzepeifangbanbenID},#{item.Ffentiaoxiangshi}, #{item.FfentiaoxiangshiID}, #{item.FKwZhuangtai},#{item.FXgZhuangtai},#{item.FJdZhuangtai},#{item.Fyujiwanchengshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.FIsDeleted}, #{item.FfenpeitiaoxiangshiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.LastModifyBy})
